ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Prepare for another nerf...
ygData.msgSnippet: Who has time to watch movies? I ve never just sat around singing manasong, and I would agree that it s a pathetic plight to just sing manasong. Why stand for
ygData.messageBody:
Who has time to watch movies? I've never just sat around singing manasong,
and I would agree that it's a pathetic plight to just sing manasong. Why
stand for it? (ie. why let other classes dictate what you sing?)

----Windleaf


At 03:59 PM 9/20/00 -0700, jhenders@... wrote:

>It is nice to see it's got buy in from those that like to watch movies
>while playing the mana song though.
>
>On Wed, Sep 20/00, "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
><garramone@...> wrote:
> >
> > I couldn't agree less =b
> >
> > Shada
> >
> > > >Goodness, people bitch way too much about VI. What part of, "You're
> > > >in our world now" did you people not understand? Was that not a clue
> > > >when you started playing this game? Max haste was a known bug that
> > > >EVERYONE was exploiting. They fixed it, get over it.
> > >
> > > I couldn't agree more.
> > >
> > > ---Windleaf Mistsong
